title: Om shivam shivam
sahitya:
Om shivam shivam enra nAma japattinai orumaiyuDan shei manamE


anupallavi

  kAmanai vellum kAlanaik-kollum kavalaiyaikkellum kani madhura shollAm


caraNam    gurupara mantiram tiru mighat-tandiDum guhaik-kanal ezhuppiDum paghaik-kulam azhittiDum
iru vinai arugiDap-perugiDum sutantaram idayat-tuDippuDanE irundu nirantaram
